verses.verse: Again the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> came to me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; I was jealous <WH7065> <WH8765> for TZiyon <WH6726> with great <WH1419> jealousy <WH7068>, and I was jealous <WH7065> <WH8765> for her with great <WH1419> fury <WH2534>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; I am returned <WH7725> <WH8804> unto TZiyon <WH6726>, and will dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> in the midst <WH8432> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>: and Yerushalayim <WH3389> shall be called <WH7121> <WH8738> a city <WH5892> of truth <WH571>; and the mountain <WH2022> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> the holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; There shall yet old men <WH2205> and old women <WH2205> dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> in the streets <WH7339> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and every man <WH376> with his staff <WH4938> in his hand <WH3027> for very <WH7230> age <WH3117>.
And the streets <WH7339> of the city <WH5892> shall be full <WH4390> <WH8735> of boys <WH3206> and girls <WH3207> playing <WH7832> <WH8764> in the streets <WH7339> thereof.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; If it be marvellous <WH6381> <WH8735> in the eyes <WH5869> of the remnant <WH7611> of this people <WH5971> in these days <WH3117>, should it also be marvellous <WH6381> <WH8735> in mine eyes <WH5869>? saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; Behold, I will save <WH3467> <WH8688> my people <WH5971> from the east <WH4217> country <WH776>, and from the west <WH3996> <WH8121> country <WH776>;

And I will bring <WH935> <WH8689> them, and they shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> in the midst <WH8432> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>: and they shall be my people <WH5971>, and I will be their 'Elohim <WH430>, in truth <WH571> and in righteousness <WH6666>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; Let your hands <WH3027> be strong <WH2388> <WH8799>, ye that hear <WH8085> <WH8802> in these days <WH3117> these words <WH1697> by the mouth <WH6310> of the prophets <WH5030>, which were in the day <WH3117> that the foundation <WH3245> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> was laid <WH3245> <WH8795>, that the temple <WH1964> might be built <WH1129> <WH8736>.

For before <WH6440> these days <WH3117> there was <WH1961> <WH8738> no hire <WH7939> for man <WH120>, nor any hire <WH7939> for beast <WH929>; neither was there any peace <WH7965> to him that went out <WH3318> <WH8802> or came in <WH935> <WH8802> because of the affliction <WH6862>: for I set <WH7971> <WH8762> all men <WH120> every one <WH376> against his neighbour <WH7453>.
But now I will not be unto the residue <WH7611> of this people <WH5971> as in the former <WH7223> days <WH3117>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.

For the seed <WH2233> shall be prosperous <WH7965>; the vine <WH1612> shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> her fruit <WH6529>, and the ground <WH776> shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> her increase <WH2981>, and the heavens <WH8064> shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> their dew <WH2919>; and I will cause the remnant <WH7611> of this people <WH5971> to possess <WH5157> <WH8689> all these things.

And it shall come to pass, that as ye were a curse <WH7045> among the heathen <WH1471>, O house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; so will I save <WH3467> <WH8686> you, and ye shall be a b'rakhah <WH1293>: fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not, but let your hands <WH3027> be strong <WH2388> <WH8799>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; As I thought <WH2161> <WH8804> to punish <WH7489> <WH8687> you, when your fathers <WH1> provoked me to wrath <WH7107> <WH8687>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, and I repented <WH5162> <WH8738> not:

So again <WH7725> <WH8804> have I thought <WH2161> <WH8804> in these days <WH3117> to do well <WH3190> <WH8687> unto Yerushalayim <WH3389> and to the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063>: fear <WH3372> <WH8799> ye not.

These are the things <WH1697> that ye shall do <WH6213> <WH8799>; Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> ye every man <WH376> the truth <WH571> to his neighbour <WH7453>; execute <WH8199> <WH8798> the judgment <WH4941> of truth <WH571> and peace <WH7965> in your gates <WH8179>:

And let none <WH376> of you imagine <WH2803> <WH8799> evil <WH7451> in your hearts <WH3824> against his neighbour <WH7453>; and love <WH157> <WH8799> no false <WH8267> oath <WH7621>: for all these are things that I hate <WH8130> <WH8804>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.
And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; The fast <WH6685> of the fourth <WH7243> month, and the fast <WH6685> of the fifth <WH2549>, and the fast <WH6685> of the seventh <WH7637>, and the fast <WH6685> of the tenth <WH6224>, shall be to the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063> joy <WH8342> and gladness <WH8057>, and cheerful <WH2896> feasts <WH4150>; therefore love <WH157> <WH8798> the truth <WH571> and peace <WH7965>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; It shall yet come to pass, that there shall come <WH935> <WH8799> people <WH5971>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of many <WH7227> cities <WH5892>:

And the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of one <WH259> city shall go <WH1980> <WH8804> to another <WH259>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Let us go <WH3212> <WH8799> speedily <WH1980> <WH8800> to pray <WH2470> <WH8763> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, and to seek <WH1245> <WH8763> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>: I will go <WH3212> <WH8799> also.

Yea, many <WH7227> people <WH5971> and strong <WH6099> nations <WH1471> shall come <WH935> <WH8804> to seek <WH1245> <WH8763> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> in Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and to pray <WH2470> <WH8763> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; In those days <WH3117> it shall come to pass, that ten <WH6235> men <WH582> shall take hold <WH2388> <WH8686> out of all languages <WH3956> of the nations <WH1471>, even shall take hold <WH2388> <WH8689> of the skirt <WH3671> of him that is a Jew <WH376> <WH3064>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, We will go <WH3212> <WH8799> with you: for we have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> that 'Elohim <WH430> is with you.
